author: holiman
content: Besu finished it's hive-run, and fails the `eip2315NotRemoved_d0g0v0_Berlin`. However, turns out it was running on `besu/v21.1.1-dev-1a7b5019/linux-x86_64/oracle_openjdk-java-11`, so it was built just before the removal commit was  made.

author: dimitry8570
content:
Test regeneration and fix update: 
https://github.com/ethereum/tests/releases/tag/8.0.1

All state tests now have an rlp `txbytes` field. So no need to parse transaction arrays and do the signing.
